data.persona: I am the local thief of the village. I pickpocket villagers and loot their homes. I move very fast and I like to operate at night.
data.description:
You are in the Dining hall.
The dining hall is large and airy. Huge candelabras with many candles stand throughout the room. There is one huge wooden table spanning the room that can accommodate a hundred guests. Tapestries with angels line the walls. The chairs are gilded and intricate.
The guest is here.

You are carrying a meat.

data.short_motivation: I will steal from the guest before making my getaway.
data.mid_motivation: I will return home, then examine and enjoy the loot from my day's thieving.
data.long_motivation: I will steal whatever I can, whenever I can and live well off the proceeds of my crimes.
